content: digital-pdf crochet pattern for lacy spring cardigan in xs-5x the lacy spring cardigan is designed to add a touch of femininity to your wardrobe an easy-breezy cardigan to pull on over tanks or a summer dress delicate airy lace stitch works up beautifully and is catching to the eye a stunning wearable design made in cotton perfect for warm sunny days difficulty intermediate written in standard american terms yarn requirements original yarn discontinued suitable alternative cotlin dk #3 - 70% tanguis cotton 30% linen 123yds/50g - https //shrsl com/3entv xs/s m/l xl-3x 4x/5x 10 12 15 17 yards 1164 1455 1746 2037 crochet hook requirements us 5/f 3 75mm or size needed to obtain gauge buy here https //shrsl com/2do90 https //shrsl com/39asl - use code mjs15 for 15% off additional supplies yarn needle removable stitch markers blocking mat and pins gauge you may need to adjust hook size to obtain the correct gauge 14 sts and 6 row = 4 video link https //youtu be/6nzychhey1g you are welcome to sell finished products from this design please reference mj s off the hook as the designer you must use your own photos to sell your work all my images are copyright protected and cannot be used to sell your items due to the nature of patterns there are no returns or refunds all sales are final
